info.name: About Module
info.description: API endpoints for about page management including company story, vision, mission, and page content

request.description: Get complete about page data (public access)

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{ "title": "Updated About Our Company", "subtitle": "Your trusted partner in innovative technology solutions", "description": "We are a leading technology company dedicated to providing cutting-edge solutions and exceptional service to our clients worldwide.", "content": "

Founded in 2010, our company has been at the forefront of technological innovation, helping businesses transform their operations...

", "image": { "url": "https://example.com/updated-about-image.jpg", "publicId": "updated-about-image-id", "folder": "app/about", "altText": "Updated about our company", "width": 1200, "height": 800, "format": "jpg", "size": 300000 }, "isActive": true }

request.description: Update about page content (Admin/Super Admin only)

response.name: Success Response
